title: Tribe confident despite unpopular trade
subtitle: Trade unpopular, but Tribe confident
body: CLEVELAND -- Show a little faith, Tribe fans. That's general manager Mark Shapiro's plea in the wake of a rather unpopular move that sent outfielder Coco Crisp to the Red Sox on Friday night. "Bear with me, hang in there and trust we have a very bright future in '06 and beyond," was Shapiro's message to fans during a conference call with reporters Saturday morning. Anthony Castrovince is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Anthony Castrovince
